nickname.header: 채팅을 시작하기 전에 닉네임을 반드시 설정해주세요

2kki.hostedWithPermission: 본 서버는 유메2키 개발진의 허가를 받아 운영됩니다.

messages.leavePage: 저장하지 않은 게임 진행 상황이 손실됩니다. 정말로 창을 닫으시겠습니까?

common.failedSlotInput: 입력한 슬롯이 올바르지 않습니다. 1 ~ 15 범위의 세이브 파일 슬롯 번호를 입력해주세요.

upload.slotInput: 1 ~ 15 범위의 세이브 파일 슬롯 번호를 입력해주세요.

download.slotInput: 1 ~ 15 범위의 세이브 파일 슬롯 번호를 입력해주세요.
download.emptySlot: 이런! 입력한 슬롯에 대한 세이브 파일이 비어 있습니다.

tips.menuTheme: Your name color and your player list entry style are based on your in-game menu theme.
tips.playersInMap: You can switch between the number of players online and the number of players in your map by clicking the label.
tips.globalChatLocation: You can view the location a global chat message was sent in by hovering over or pressing the globe icon to the left of the message. It will also show or hide future global chat message locations based on your last show or hide.
tips.markdownSupport: Chat supports text formatting by wrapping text in certain characters. Currently supported are: **bold** (\*\*text\*\*), *italic* (\*text\*, \_text\_), __underline__ (\_\_text\_\_), and ~~strikethrough~~ (\~\~text\~\~).
tips.chatTabNotifications: When you are in a chat tab other than 'All', if a new message is sent in the other filtered tab, it will add bolding to the tab label to notify you.
tips.clearChat: When you click the clear chat button at the top right of the chat box, if you are not currently in the 'All' tab, it will only remove messages for the current chat tab you're on.
tips.openSource: YNOproject is open source and the code repositories are available at https://github.com/ynoproject/
